newsitem.title: USA: U.S. March S&P 500s lower late in the day.
newsitem.headline: U.S. March S&P 500s lower late in the day.

text.p: March 4 - U.S. March S&P 500 were lower late in the day, pressed by selling from a dealer after June T-bonds closed near their session lows. Traders said others lightening up positions before Greenspan's Humphrey-Hawkins testimony on Wednesday. Support at 791.00, trader said. Trade nervous, overall volume light. ((DerivativesDesk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com))
